thread.section_title: Yaniv & Associates, PC Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Yaniv & Associates, PC | uncontesteddivorceny.com
thread.title: James Gibbs
thread.title_full: Yaniv & Associates, PC reviewed by James Gibbs

author: James Gibbs
title: James Gibbs
text:
My experience with Yaniv & Associates was very smooth and easy. They were very informative and helpful from start to finish. Every single rep that I conversed with had knowledge of my case and were courteous and willing to assist me. My divorce was executed in a timely manor and within the exact time frame that was provided to me which was 2 months, actually a bit less even though I filed during the holiday season. I would highly recommend Yaniv and associates to anyone that is seeking divorce, it is definitely worth the experience if you are looking for a firm that is on point in all aspects of divorce and the best course of action to file. I couldn't be more satisfied.
Kind regards,
James J. Gibbs
